comments.comment: My dear brothers and sisters of Sri Lanka. Sinhalese, Tamil, Muslim, Malay and Burgher, we are all children of mother Sri Lanka.. Let's come together and make the right decision for all communities and ethnic groups of our motherland. Mr Sajith Premadasa is the only candidate who supports human rights, stands firmly against racism, discrimination and supports equal treatment to all majority & minority groups, which includes Sinhalese, Tamils, Muslims, Burghers and Malays.. All of us born in Sri Lanka deserve to have equal rights and do not wish to be victims of racism.. Let's come together and support Mr Sajith Premadasa to be our new President.. God bless you all...and wish all the blessings and success to Mr Sajith Premadasa.. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

comments.comment:
We do not care whoever effectively and efficiently implement Nagananda's team's proposed new constitution through a mandate obtained from us, Sri Lankan people (voters) being the SUPREME AUTHORITY of our country (Thanks a lot Nagananda for educating us on this, not any dirty Sri Lankan politician or so called Legal Experts of our country, told this noble truth, we were cheated for 71 years, and kept in pitch dark)

Even if Nagananda's two Labs (WE LOVE LABS AS SMART DOGS USED TO DETECT EXPLOSIVES,  NARCOTICS, ETC, OF COURSE THEY ARE FAITHFUL AND UNLIKE HUMAN, THEY KNOW THE GRATIVITY) can do it, to save us by liberating Sri Lanka from  filthy greedy corrupted fraudulent political terrorists from South to North, and West to East (all same, whether they are Sinhala, Tamil, Muslim guys, all as one Terrorist Maphia team exploited us, masses for 71+years, more than EUROPEAN INVADERS of Portuguese, Dutch, English dirty fu....kers  (we never meant good individuals of those countries but INVADERS and EXPLOITERS only), WE DO NOT CARE!!!!!

WE WISH NAGANANDA AND TEAM THE BEST OF HEALTH!!!
comments.author: Richy Safety Advisors

comments.comment:
Ooyi, VoiceTube fu....k, DON'T MISLEAD people BY your f.. Title "Na...Sa...Ekvei", what he stressed is that Nagananda asked Sajith to borrow the New Constitution compiled  by Nagananda  and his team, may edit without even touching  the ESSENTIAL ITEMS/CLAUSES, request  the supreme  authority of S.L, ie us, the masses, people (voters) to approve it, if Sajith wants to remove PM as at present not only Sajith but also "Wayima" (son of the creator " Sakray" in the Hindu Mythology which our group never believes in, by the way) CANNOT REMOVE PM under the constitution's 19th Amendment of S.L.

If Sajith acts to the very letter Nagananda's statements to Sajith, Nagananda will respond honestly.

NAGANANDA DID NOT SAY, HE JUST JOIN ANY P.CANDIDATE OF ANY COLOR.
